Lemma A.8 (Cloud delay recursion).

Under Assumptions 1,3 and 2, where we define 𝒬h=𝔼​[∥𝛚τ−𝛚h−1∥2]subscript𝒬ℎ𝔼delimited-[]superscriptdelimited-∥∥subscript𝛚𝜏subscript𝛚ℎ12\mathcal{Q}_{h}=\mathbb{E}[\lVert\bm{\omega}_{\tau}-\bm{\omega}_{h-1}\rVert^{2}], where 𝛚τ,Zsubscript𝛚𝜏𝑍\bm{\omega}_{\tau,Z} is the iterate received at cloud step hℎh, then

(34) 𝒬hsubscript𝒬ℎ\displaystyle\mathcal{Q}_{h} ≤γ2​α2​β2​(𝒪​(Kc2​Z2​E2​V2)+β2​𝒪​(Kc2​Kg2​E2​Z2​V2))absentsuperscript𝛾2superscript𝛼2superscript𝛽2𝒪superscriptsubscript𝐾𝑐2superscript𝑍2superscript𝐸2subscript𝑉2superscript𝛽2𝒪superscriptsubscript𝐾𝑐2superscriptsubscript𝐾𝑔2superscript𝐸2superscript𝑍2subscript𝑉2\displaystyle\leq\gamma^{2}\alpha^{2}\beta^{2}(\mathcal{O}(K_{c}^{2}Z^{2}E^{2}V_{2})+\beta^{2}\mathcal{O}(K_{c}^{2}K_{g}^{2}E^{2}Z^{2}V_{2}))
+2​α2​Kc​∑r=1Kc−1𝒬h−r2superscript𝛼2subscript𝐾𝑐superscriptsubscript𝑟1subscript𝐾𝑐1subscript𝒬ℎ𝑟\displaystyle\quad+2\alpha^{2}K_{c}\sum_{r=1}^{K_{c}-1}\mathcal{Q}_{h-r}
Proof.

By Assumption 2, h−1−τ≤Kcℎ1𝜏subscript𝐾𝑐h-1-\tau\leq K_{c}, therefore, there have been atmost Kcsubscript𝐾𝑐K_{c} cloud steps between 𝝎τsubscript𝝎𝜏\bm{\omega}_{\tau} and 𝝎h−1subscript𝝎ℎ1\bm{\omega}_{h-1} and we can express this difference as a telescopic sum of consecutive steps on the cloud followed by triangle inequality.

(35) 𝒬hsubscript𝒬ℎ\displaystyle\mathcal{Q}_{h} =𝔼​[∥∑r=0h−τ(𝝎h−r−𝝎h−r−1)∥2]absent𝔼delimited-[]superscriptdelimited-∥∥superscriptsubscript𝑟0ℎ𝜏subscript𝝎ℎ𝑟subscript𝝎ℎ𝑟12\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}[\lVert\sum_{r=0}^{h-\tau}(\bm{\omega}_{h-r}-\bm{\omega}_{h-r-1})\rVert^{2}]

Now, we can analyze each term in the sum in Eq. (36) separately. Let 𝝎τh−r,Zsubscript𝝎subscript𝜏ℎ𝑟𝑍\bm{\omega}_{\tau_{h-r},Z} be the model received at the cloud at step h−rℎ𝑟h-r, then

𝔼​[∥𝝎h−r−𝝎h−r−1∥2]𝔼delimited-[]superscriptdelimited-∥∥subscript𝝎ℎ𝑟subscript𝝎ℎ𝑟12\displaystyle\mathbb{E}[\lVert\bm{\omega}_{h-r}-\bm{\omega}_{h-r-1}\rVert^{2}] ≤α2​𝔼​[∥𝝎τh−r,Z−𝝎h−r−1∥2]absentsuperscript𝛼2𝔼delimited-[]superscriptdelimited-∥∥subscript𝝎subscript𝜏ℎ𝑟𝑍subscript𝝎ℎ𝑟12\displaystyle\leq\alpha^{2}\mathbb{E}[\lVert\bm{\omega}_{\tau_{h-r},Z}-\bm{\omega}_{h-r-1}\rVert^{2}]

+𝔼[∥𝝎τh−r−𝝎h−r−1∥2])\displaystyle\quad+\mathbb{E}[\lVert\bm{\omega}_{\tau_{h-r}}-\bm{\omega}_{h-r-1}\rVert^{2}]\bigg{)}

We utilize the update equation at the cloud with convexity of the ∥⋅∥delimited-∥∥⋅\lVert\cdot\rVert along with the triangle inequality and Lemma A.7 in the above steps.

Plugging this into Eq. (36) and using Assumption 2, we get our result.

𝒬hsubscript𝒬ℎ\displaystyle\mathcal{Q}_{h} ≤2(h−τ)α2((h−τ)γ2β2(𝒪(Z2E2V2)+β2𝒪(Kg2E2Z2V2))\displaystyle\leq 2(h-\tau)\alpha^{2}\bigg{(}(h-\tau)\gamma^{2}\beta^{2}(\mathcal{O}(Z^{2}E^{2}V_{2})+\beta^{2}\mathcal{O}(K_{g}^{2}E^{2}Z^{2}V_{2}))
(37) +∑r=1h−τ𝒬h−r)\displaystyle\quad+\sum_{r=1}^{h-\tau}\mathcal{Q}_{h-r}\bigg{)}
≤γ2​α2​β2​(𝒪​(Kc2​Z2​E2​V2)+β2​𝒪​(Kc2​Kg2​E2​Z2​V2))absentsuperscript𝛾2superscript𝛼2superscript𝛽2𝒪superscriptsubscript𝐾𝑐2superscript𝑍2superscript𝐸2subscript𝑉2superscript𝛽2𝒪superscriptsubscript𝐾𝑐2superscriptsubscript𝐾𝑔2superscript𝐸2superscript𝑍2subscript𝑉2\displaystyle\leq\gamma^{2}\alpha^{2}\beta^{2}(\mathcal{O}(K_{c}^{2}Z^{2}E^{2}V_{2})+\beta^{2}\mathcal{O}(K_{c}^{2}K_{g}^{2}E^{2}Z^{2}V_{2}))

∎

Using these lemmas, we can analyze the progress made in a single step at the cloud.

Lemma A.9 (Single-step Cloud).

Under Assumptions 1,3 and 2, after a single step on the cloud, we have,

𝔼​[LN​(𝝎h)−LN​(𝝎h−1)]𝔼delimited-[]subscript𝐿𝑁subscript𝝎ℎsubscript𝐿𝑁subscript𝝎ℎ1\displaystyle\mathbb{E}[L_{N}(\bm{\omega}_{h})-L_{N}(\bm{\omega}_{h-1})] ≤−γ​α​β​c​∑z=0Z−1∑e=0E−1𝔼​[∥∇LN​(𝝎τ,ζ,e)∥2]absent𝛾𝛼𝛽𝑐superscriptsubscript𝑧0𝑍1superscriptsubscript𝑒0𝐸1𝔼delimited-[]superscriptdelimited-∥∥∇subscript𝐿𝑁subscript𝝎𝜏𝜁𝑒2\displaystyle\leq-\gamma\alpha\beta c\sum_{z=0}^{Z-1}\sum_{e=0}^{E-1}\mathbb{E}[\lVert\nabla L_{N}(\bm{\omega}_{\tau,\zeta,e})\rVert^{2}]
(39) +Ξh,∀h>0subscriptΞℎfor-allℎ0\displaystyle\quad+\Xi_{h},\quad\forall h>0

where

Ξh=α​β​γ2​𝒪​(ρ​E3​Z​V2)+α​γ​β2​𝒪​(Kg​E​Z​V1​V2)+α​γ2​β3​𝒪​((L+ρ)​Kg2​E2​Z​V2)+α​ρ​γ2​β2​(𝒪​(Z2​E2​V2)+β2​𝒪​(Kg2​E2​Z2​V2))+𝒪​(α​V1)​𝒬h+α​𝒪​(ρ+L)​𝒬hsubscriptΞℎ𝛼𝛽superscript𝛾2𝒪𝜌superscript𝐸3𝑍subscript𝑉2𝛼𝛾superscript𝛽2𝒪subscript𝐾𝑔𝐸𝑍subscript𝑉1subscript𝑉2𝛼superscript𝛾2superscript𝛽3𝒪𝐿𝜌superscriptsubscript𝐾𝑔2superscript𝐸2𝑍subscript𝑉2𝛼𝜌superscript𝛾2superscript𝛽2𝒪superscript𝑍2superscript𝐸2subscript𝑉2superscript𝛽2𝒪superscriptsubscript𝐾𝑔2superscript𝐸2superscript𝑍2subscript𝑉2𝒪𝛼subscript𝑉1subscript𝒬ℎ𝛼𝒪𝜌𝐿subscript𝒬ℎ\displaystyle\begin{split}\Xi_{h}=&\alpha\beta\gamma^{2}\mathcal{O}(\rho E^{3}ZV_{2})+\alpha\gamma\beta^{2}\mathcal{O}(K_{g}EZ\sqrt{V_{1}V_{2}})\\ &+\alpha\gamma^{2}\beta^{3}\mathcal{O}((L+\rho)K_{g}^{2}E^{2}ZV_{2})\\ &+\alpha\rho\gamma^{2}\beta^{2}(\mathcal{O}(Z^{2}E^{2}V_{2})+\beta^{2}\mathcal{O}(K_{g}^{2}E^{2}Z^{2}V_{2}))\\ &+\mathcal{O}(\alpha\sqrt{V_{1}})\sqrt{\mathcal{Q}_{h}}+\alpha\mathcal{O}(\rho+L)\mathcal{Q}_{h}\end{split}
Proof.

The proof is similar to that of Lemma A.4 until  20, so we state the corresponding equation for a single cloud step.

(40) 𝔼​[LN​(𝝎h)−LN​(𝝎h−1)]𝔼delimited-[]subscript𝐿𝑁subscript𝝎ℎsubscript𝐿𝑁subscript𝝎ℎ1\displaystyle\mathbb{E}[L_{N}(\bm{\omega}_{h})-L_{N}(\bm{\omega}_{h-1})]
≤α​𝔼​[LN​(𝝎τ,Z)−LN​(𝝎τ)]+α​𝔼​[LN​(𝝎τ)−LN​(𝝎h−1)]absent𝛼𝔼delimited-[]subscript𝐿𝑁subscript𝝎𝜏𝑍subscript𝐿𝑁subscript𝝎𝜏𝛼𝔼delimited-[]subscript𝐿𝑁subscript𝝎𝜏subscript𝐿𝑁subscript𝝎ℎ1\displaystyle\leq\alpha\mathbb{E}[L_{N}(\bm{\omega}_{\tau,Z})-L_{N}(\bm{\omega}_{\tau})]+\alpha\mathbb{E}[L_{N}(\bm{\omega}_{\tau})-L_{N}(\bm{\omega}_{h-1})]
